column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////There was a bit of wait
column2: but not bad for accommodating a party of 7 without reservations. Our total was $71
column3: which seems like a lot but for 7 people (and including an appetizer sampler)
column4: but when you divide it that many ways this place was actually pretty cheap
column5: especially compared to most other places in the area.
